narrative.title: 5 Leichte Division - 1941Q1
narrative.situation: German leichte Division (Light Division) deployed in North Africa - Libya during 1941Q1.
narrative.objectives: Mobile offensive operations in desert terrain
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

supply.notes: Building up supply infrastructure, extended supply lines from Tripoli
